scripts.asbuild:debug-watch: nodemon --config .nodemon.json -w assembly/ -w shared/ -w asconfig.json -e ts -x yarn run asbuild:debug
scripts.asbuild:release-watch: nodemon --config .nodemon.json -w assembly/ -w shared/ -w asconfig.json -e ts -x yarn run asbuild:release
scripts.asbuild: yarn run asbuild:debug && yarn run asbuild:release
scripts.asbuild-watch: nodemon --config .nodemon.json -w assembly/ -w shared/ -w asconfig.json -e ts -x yarn run asbuild
scripts.astest-watch: nodemon --config .nodemon.json -w assembly/ -w shared/ -w asconfig.json -w as-pect.config.js -w as-pect.asconfig.js -e ts -x asp -- --config as-pect.config.js --as-config as-pect.asconfig.json
scripts.build: yarn run asbuild && yarn run libbuild && yarn run vitebuild
scripts.build-lib: yarn run asbuild && yarn run libbuild && yarn run vitebuild-lib && shx cp -r build/types/lib/* dist/ && shx rm dist/page-start.d.ts
scripts.test: yarn run astest && yarn run libtest && yarn run sharedtest
scripts.dev: yarn run asbuild:debug && concurrently -p name -c "bgCyan,bgYellow,bgMagenta,bgBlue,bgGray" -n "wasm ,wasmT,libT ,sharT,vite " "cross-env NO_CLS=true yarn run asbuild:debug-watch" "cross-env NO_CLS=true yarn run astest-watch --no-logo" "yarn run libtest-watch" "yarn run sharedtest-watch" "yarn run start"
